name: Idle Titanic Tycoon: Ship Game
description:
Captain this historic ship and profit from your guests by managing your ship hotel game like a tycoon. It’s a rollercoaster ride - no need to tap and tap or click and click - just build, invest and entertain your guests.

Don’t be idle! Use the cash and gold profits that you make to invest and boost your facilities and unlock new areas in this idle game. Invest like a tycoon capitalist and become rich with all the idle profits and cash you can earn.

FEATURES
Become a Titanic Tycoon millionaire or even a billionaire!
Invest and increase your idle game income. Don’t idel, but idle!
Earn idle cash and make profit, even when you are offline in this game - like a tycoon!
Hire staff for your idle Titanic to increase your guests once in a lifetime experience.
Enjoy the adventure, no need to tap and click or be a tapper or a clicker in this game.
Profit from upgrading your rooms and open new ones to become rich!
Like a simulator, use the right idle tycoon game strategy to earn cash and profit.
Can you use the right strategy become an idle Titanic tycoon, capitalist, millionaire or billionaire and strike gold?!
This is not a clicker or tapper game, you just need to invest like a tycoon in your Titanic, to make more cash, gold and profit to invest in your awesome liner. Enjoy the adventure!
Increase your earnings, cash, gold and profit - either online or offline earnings.
Build your idle millionaire empire by investing in the right rooms and staff, so you can earn profit and maximise the workflow in this idle manager game - a bit like an online clicker simulator, but no need to click or tap.
Gain cash resources, gold and revenue in this Titanic tycoon simulation game
This isn’t something traditional like a supermarket, mine, police station, TV station or rollercoaster ride! This is THE Idle Titanic game, you’re going to become rich like a capitalist millionaire tycoon - full or wealth, cash and gold.
No internet connection needed to play this idle tycoon empire game
Automate your idle guests by investing in managers so your can earn profits like a tycoon
Profit like a tycoon from rich money investments to boost your economy, win cash and become a rich millionaire
This is no ordinary money idle game.

Areas to unlock include:

GYM - no time to idle here - do sit ups like a successful millionaire tycoon!

CINEMA - what film will you play?!

BALLROOM - dance to the tunes of your favourite tycoon band

SHUFFLEBOARD - do the shuffle.

ART LESSONS - hear the swoosh, tap, splat of an artist at work.

LIBRARY - shhh, it’s time to relax in this exquisite room.

CASINO - Where true capitalist tycoons are made. Everything on red!

and MUCH MUCH MORE to discover. Download now!
